pkgndep 1.1.1

  • Reference

Load all package dependency statistics

load_pkg_stat_snapshot.Rd

Load all package dependency statistics

load_pkg_stat_snapshot()

Details

It loads the package dependency analysis for all CRAN/Biocondutor packages done on 2021-10-28.

Value

A data frame of various columns.

Examples

df = load_pkg_stat_snapshot()
head(df)

#>                 package                                              repository
#> a4                   a4 https://bioconductor.org/packages/3.14/bioc/src/contrib
#> a4Base           a4Base https://bioconductor.org/packages/3.14/bioc/src/contrib
#> a4Classif     a4Classif https://bioconductor.org/packages/3.14/bioc/src/contrib
#> a4Core           a4Core https://bioconductor.org/packages/3.14/bioc/src/contrib
#> a4Preproc     a4Preproc https://bioconductor.org/packages/3.14/bioc/src/contrib
#> a4Reporting a4Reporting https://bioconductor.org/packages/3.14/bioc/src/contrib
#>             n_by_strong n_by_all n_parents gini_index
#> a4                   81      161         5  0.7803030
#> a4Base               72      153        13  0.2276423
#> a4Classif            30       84        11  0.2914286
#> a4Core               17       36         4  0.5555556
#> a4Preproc             6       62         2  0.2000000
#> a4Reporting           4       24         2  0.2500000
#>             max_heaviness_from_parents adjusted_max_heaviness_from_parents
#> a4                                  48                          3.11688312
#> a4Base                               4                          0.67532468
#> a4Classif                            6                          0.85714286
#> a4Core                              11                          0.57142857
#> a4Preproc                            1                          0.02597403
#> a4Reporting                          3                          0.07792208
#>                                                                                                                                                                                                      max_heaviness_parent_info
#> a4                  Parent package &lsquo;a4Base&rsquo; contibutes the highest heaviness on &lsquo;a4&rsquo;. It is listed in &lsquo;Depends&rsquo but no object from parent is imported to the namespace of &lsquo;a4&rsquo;.
#> a4Base                                            Parent package &lsquo;genefilter&rsquo; contibutes the highest heaviness on &lsquo;a4Base&rsquo;. 5 functions/objects are imported to the namespace of &lsquo;a4Base&rsquo;.
#> a4Classif                                         Parent package &lsquo;ROCR&rsquo; contibutes the highest heaviness on &lsquo;a4Classif&rsquo;. 3 functions/objects are imported to the namespace of &lsquo;a4Classif&rsquo;.
#> a4Core      Parent package &lsquo;glmnet&rsquo; contibutes the highest heaviness on &lsquo;a4Core&rsquo;. The whole set of functions/methods/classes from parent package is imported to the namespace of &lsquo;a4Core&rsquo;.
#> a4Preproc                                      Parent package &lsquo;Biobase&rsquo; contibutes the highest heaviness on &lsquo;a4Preproc&rsquo;. 7 functions/objects are imported to the namespace of &lsquo;a4Preproc&rsquo;.
